#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#define mod 17
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
	ll t,n,i,p;
	char ar[1005];
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	ll rem;
	while(t--)
	{
		p=0;
		rem=0;
		scanf("%s",ar);
		n=strlen(ar);
		if(n==1 && ar[0]=='0')
		{
		printf("YES\n");
		continue;
	}
		else
		{
			p=(ar[0]-'0')*10+ar[1]-'0';
			rem=p%mod;
			for(i=2;i<n;i++)
			{
				p=rem*10+ar[i]-'0';
				rem=p%mod;
			}
		}
		if(rem==0)
		printf("YES\n");
		else
		printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
